title: Torchship
description: A captain who'll take any job if there's enough money in it.A pilot with an agenda of her own. And a mechanic with an eye on the pilot.The crew of the "Fives Full" are just trying to make enough money to keep themselves in the black while avoiding the attention of a government so paranoid it's repealed Moore's Law.They're not looking for adventure in the stars... but they're not going to back down just because something got in their way.
author: Karl K. Gallagher
